entries.message: Mnt completed both line card installed in each DS in Singapore

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We are performing system changes in the Singapore location during the following scheduled maintenance window. 

Start Time: 2022-02-07 19:00:00 UTC
End Time: 2022-02-07 21:00:00 UTC

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Singapore instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.

Event Type: Network Upgrade

We schedule higher impact maintenance events during off-peak times to maintain our ideal hosting environment. Our engineers make every effort to minimize system impact; however, Amsterdam instances may be unreachable for some, or all, of the scheduled maintenance window as we perform network, firmware, or host upgrades.
